sentence: Otherwise the property is very good with all facilities and a huge dinning and conference area
I believe it is due to it is high occupancy rate as it is next to convention centre and shopping centre

Can be a little confusing initially to figure out the routes to Central World BTS skywalk or to the other malls not helped by the security for an international conference happening plus recent bombing incident but once figured out getting around is very convenient with the various exits
Stayed at this hotel a few years back for a business conference so when I decided to travel with my wife for a break I did not hesitate to book here
The only drawback is that it is also a business centre and there are too many functions on the pool side so
The Hotel was vastly improved on almost all parameters from the time it was essentially a huge convention centre that also ran a hotel
Due to time constraint with a DD event squeezed in on the 1st night followed by major shopping days I only have the time to take one picture of the room
Got a chance to attend the meeting and have lunch on the 24th floor here today
The corridor along the ballroom was often cooler than in the ballroom itself
The Events Manager was rude and obnoxious were asked about the Aircon
Location was good to the event that I needed to attend
Creative cocktails are the hit of the venue
This was really great as the hotel was pretty fully booked with a couple of huge conferences going on at the Bangkok Convention Centre
Huge convention center
It has very large convention halls which can accommodate a very large gathering

Sitting just next to the bangkok convention centre and central world shopping mall the hotel is strategically and conveniently located in the heart of bangkok with easy access to the metro and shopping district
Great location for the convention centre
Chose this hotel as it was at the conference venue itself
The convention center is one of the best and state of the art
They helped us book multiple tours events and even spoke with the local tour guides to ensure we were confirmed
